name: Lushtemples — Highlights of the Hike
description:
The "Lushtemples" are a series of generative designs that attempt to capture the graphic harmony and density of the nature untamed ; the works remain aware of the un-natural process of re-creating nature with code, introducing some notes of artificiality and hints of the underlying technique, such as simplistic 3D meshes or destructive digital glitches.

Started as an experiment with "figurative generative" approach and pen plotters, the graphic style evolved into a more painterly style with timeless settings, while keeping its equation-based, line-art fundamentals.


— Generative drawing
— Made with original Javascript code
— Format PNG
— Resolution 4200x5940 

The owner of the NFT can claim :
- a fine art print of the artwork of the size of his choice up to A0
- a high resolution file of 12600x17820 pixels

request on twitter @zancan — print offered to first owner
